text: Tribosphenida is a group (infralegion) of mammals that includes the ancestor of Hypomylos, Aegialodontia and Theria (the last common ancestor of marsupials and placentals plus all of its descendants). Its current definition is more or less synonymous with Boreosphenida. ==References== ==Other websites== * MESOZOIC MAMMALS; Stem zatherians, zatherians & Peramuridae, an internet directory * THERIA Ð˜ MARSUPIONTA (in Russian) * Infralegion Tribosphenida - Hierarchy - The Taxonomicon Category:Taxonomy Category:Mammals
title: Tribosphenida
